Title: Comrades-in-arms
Designer: Xu Baozhong (许宝中)Li Zehao (李泽浩)
Publisher: Renmin meishu chubanshe (人民美术出版社)
Notes: Mao Zedong and his second wife, Yang Kaihui (杨开慧, 1901-1930). She holds an issue of the Xiangjiang Review (湘江评论), a journal edited by Mao in Changsha (长沙), Hunan Province, appearing only five times between June and August 1919.
